overview.title: General Clustering Exercises
overview.excerpt: Practice various clustering techniques on diverse datasets.

details.title: General Clustering Exercises
details.longDescription: This project provides multiple datasets for practicing different clustering techniques. Users can apply K-Means, DBSCAN, Hierarchical Clustering, and Gaussian Mixture Models on diverse data shapes like blobs, spirals, and custom datasets to build practical experience in unsupervised learning.
